title: Slow cooker meatballs
ingredients: ['675g minced beef', '140g dried breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon dried Italian herbs', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 egg, beaten', '1 (750g) jar pasta sauce', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 (400g) jar passata']
